name: Customers Mail List
author: Noor alam

sections.description:
woo Customers Mail List is a woocommece addons for listing customer email address

X woo Customers Mail List is nice plugin for show your customers email in one page.

If you want to show your customers email address and name in one page then the plugin is best solution for you. Its very easy to use. Only need active the plugin and go email list page. So now you can easily collect your customers email.

Awesome Plugin’s Features

  • Custom Email List
  • Customer Name List
  • Custom ID List.
  • All emails in one page
  • Easy way collect your customer email address

Translations

  • English
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

First things first, thank you for choosing our X Instafeed plugin!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  • Unzip the woo-customers-mail-list.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the Xwoo-customers-mail-list.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress
    installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate woo customers mail list.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  • Unzip the woo-customers-mail-list.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the woo-customers-mail-list.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress
    installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate woo customers mail list.
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin with woo

yes, you can use this plugin with woo.

Can I see all customers email address by this plugin

Yes, You can see all emil address by this plugin.

Can I use the plugin without woo plugin

No, The plugin is addon for woocommece so don’t use without woo plugin.

short_description: You can create your woo store customers order mail list by this plugin.
